name: CYBERGANG WARFARE
description:
CYBERGANG WARFARE was made for a SciFi themed game jam with some friends. I wanted to create something inspired by the Mount & Blade games. 

Source code: https://github.com/HendersonSoftworks/CYBERGANG-WARFARE

How To Play

Recruit units to defeat the Cyberlord!

1st person mode:

  • WASD - Move.
  • E - Purchase new gang members.

 Top down mode:

  • Left click - Move in top down mode.
  • A / D - Rotate camera.
  • Space - Activate slowmo mode.
  • P - pause game.
  • Hover mouse over enemies to see stats.
  • Defeat gangs to get credits.

Top Tips:

  • Cyborgs can only be killed by Hackers and other Cyborgs!
  • Compare your strength with your enemies before engaging!
  • Use the SlowMo mode to give yourself more time to survey the battlefield

Good luck. You'll need it.

Credits

Design & Development: Thomas Henderson

Music:

  • Eddie Palmer - What If God Was A Cyberpunk
  • Kirk Osamayo - Ambition And Sacrafice
  • Sci Fi Industries - Escala Tecnica
  • Sektor 304 vs Sci Fi Industries - Hymnn
Known Bugs:
  • WebGL version - Mouse drift when played in FireFox. If you encounter this issue please play in a chromium-based browser (Edge / Google Chrome) or download the Windows version.
